title: my pc freezes after a few seconds ingame
body:
i tried to play yesterday and this bug happened, and i turned off my pc and turned it on again tried again, same happened i accepted the loss and my friend told me that they won the game somehow. today i went into a battle training game before to test if it worked it worked fine went into a game and this happened again, FYI twitch was in both games

this was ranked solo/duo, FYI twitch was in both games and i'm using a lenovo y50-70 can run every other game just fine but not league

Are you on Windows 10?  Sometimes an update may auto enable the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) bar, which has been known to cause freezing.  Disabling that is a solid first step!

Should the issue continue, go through the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help rule out any possibilities of bad drivers or game files (could be a bad twitch rendering).  Let me know if that helps!
